resumen: Full Stack Developer with a UX/UI focus. I work on end-to-end web product development for small businesses and growing projects, prioritizing usability, clarity, and real user goals. I combine web development and design to transform ideas into functional and intuitive solutions.

roles.descripcion: Specialized in end-to-end web application and REST API development. I have worked on real-world products built from the ground up, defining architecture, data flows, and process automation. I primarily work with Laravel, Vue.js, Angular, and MySQL, handling AWS deployments and structuring applications with a strong emphasis on maintainability, code clarity, and progressive scalability. I am comfortable working on small to medium-sized projects, adapting technical complexity to the product’s actual needs.

Specialized in designing clear and intuitive interfaces for digital products. I approach design as an integral part of the product development process, defining user flows, visual hierarchies, and interactive prototypes in Figma to validate the experience before development. My experience collaborating closely with engineering teams enables me to create feasible, accessible, and consistent designs, ensuring that design specifications are accurately translated into the final implementation without losing usability or visual intent.

seccion_proyectos.developer: Achievements as a Full Stack Developer

proyectos.descripcion: RS Lodgings is a web application for room reservations and hotel service management, aimed at small businesses seeking to centralize the administration of rooms, offers, and bookings efficiently.
logros_dev: Automated administrative processes by implementing business logic with Laravel, eliminating seven manual tasks and streamlining operations.
Optimized SQL queries to reduce data load, achieving an approximate 25% improvement in execution times.
Developed a scheduled cron job for the daily update of booking statuses and room availability, automating the process and removing repetitive manual work.
logros_designer: Structured the first product version around the critical booking and payment flow, removing unnecessary steps and ensuring a clear user experience from selection to confirmation.
Defined typography and color palette following WCAG accessibility standards, achieving optimal contrast and high readability aligned with the business identity.
Designed the interactive prototype in Figma, defining navigation flows and visual hierarchies that facilitated frontend implementation and accelerated product delivery.

proyectos.descripcion: Psicobot is a web-based application designed for the management of psychological counseling appointments, integrating an artificial intelligence chatbot as a complementary tool to the support provided by mental health professionals.
logros_dev: Developed a responsive interface using Vue.js and Tailwind CSS, achieving an average usability rating of 4.6/5 on the Likert scale based on user surveys.
Automated three administrative processes within a mental health service by developing the server layer in Flask, replacing manual forms with digital solutions.
Integrated a psychological support chatbot for students through the implementation of the OpenAI external API, enabling a conversational interaction module within the system.
Designed the chatbot’s conversational flow, achieving psychometric reliability (α = 0.87) for diagnostic impression, validated through user surveys.
Led the application deployment on AWS (EC2, RDS) and validated system stability through load testing with Apache JMeter, ensuring support for more than 500 concurrent users.
logros_designer: Conducted interviews with potential users and collaborated with stakeholders to write user stories, enabling the prioritization of key features and alignment of the roadmap with project needs.
Defined the color palette using color psychology principles and institutional branding, ensuring visual consistency with the university’s identity, values, and the product’s communication intent.
Designed an interactive prototype in Figma with a minimalist structure and clear visual hierarchies, improving flow comprehension and reducing navigation friction.

proyectos.descripcion: SPEEDHUNTERS is a web-based vehicle sales application designed to digitalize dealership commercial processes, enabling quotation requests, financing options, and test drive scheduling.
logros_dev: Refactored and migrated key modules from legacy PHP to Laravel, reducing technical debt and improving system maintainability and security.
Automated commercial and administrative processes through Laravel backend modules, eliminating nine manual tasks and increasing operational efficiency.
Implemented middleware to restrict access to administrative routes, preventing unauthorized access and strengthening system security.
logros_designer: Defined a functional requirements traceability matrix to organize and prioritize features from the initial stage, reducing ambiguity and establishing a clear foundation for product design and development.
Produced wireframes that enabled early validation of user flows, preventing rework and improving communication with the development team.
Designed an interactive prototype in Figma that served as both a visual and functional reference, accelerating design decisions and ensuring the experience aligned with product objectives.
